item.title: #en @ 1545533580243177472
item.description: Open data is important, but some open datasets will become a more re-used than others. Here we demonstrate how open raw mass spectrometry data combined with rich/complete metadata can together be leveraged to give some diet readout of stool metabolomics samples. https://t.co/hP28YG6yPR
